entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI - Founding of Pension Funds and Insurance Funds and Their Membership 1996. Fund member sample.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-D39t: TÁRKI - Founding of Pension Funds and Insurance Funds and Their Membership 1996. Fund member sample.. data sheet. Version: 2009-09-11
entry.dcterms:creator: Gál, Róbert Iván
entry.dcterms:contributor: Supervisory Authority of Voluntary Reciprocal Insurance Companies
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: the survey investigates the foundation and the changes in the number of members of voluntary pension funds, health care funds and self-care funds; analyses the stratification differences between the members and the rest of the population; and tests the hypotheses relating to these differences
entry.dcterms:subject: social welfare policy and systems
labour and employment
income, property and savings
person
survey data
time-series
Sample drawn from three different places: 1. pension funds, 30 funds, 400 persons; 2. health care funds, 1-1 fund, 40 persons; 3. self-care fund, 3 funds, 60 persons.
data collection with questionnaire
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
